ee.sk.digidoc
Class CertID

java.lang.Object
  ee.sk.digidoc.CertID
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CertID
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Models the ETSI element Holds info about a certificate but not the certificate itself. Such elements will be serialized under the element

Version:
1.0
Author:
Veiko Sinivee
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

CertID

public CertID()
Creates new CertID and initializes everything to null

CertID

public CertID(java.lang.String certId,
              java.lang.String digAlg,
              byte[] digest,
              java.math.BigInteger serial,
              java.lang.String issuer,
              int type)
       throws DigiDocException
Creates new CertID

Parameters:
certId - OCSP responders cert id (in XML)
digAlg - OCSP responders certs digest algorithm id/uri
digest - OCSP responders certs digest
serial - OCSP responders certs issuers serial number
type - CertID type: signer, responder or tsa
Throws:
DigiDocException - for validation errors

CertID

public CertID(Signature sig,
              java.security.cert.X509Certificate cert,
              int type)
       throws DigiDocException
Creates new CertID by using default values for id and responders cert

Parameters:
sig - Signature object
cert - OCSP certificate for creating this ref data
type - CertID type: signer, responder or tsa
Throws:
DigiDocException - for validation errors
